posts.post_content:
Sorry Leon didn't realize there was a Tobacco Section until now. Please delete the other thread if you want to...
Anyways.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Hello everyone,

Finally getting back into buying after a month of being out of town. I'd like to purchase a Matty T206 "Dark Cap", preferably a grade of 2,3, or 4. I am not a fan of eBay mostly because I'm impatient and I rather give money to the fellow members. This being said, I do reference their past sold auctions for pricing. 

If anyone is willing to part with their Matty then let me know and I will humor you with a decent offer.

Lastly, if anyone else has any interesting Matty memorabilia/cards I will also be interested. 

Best Regards,

Colby Tan
Going to purchase a Matty this Saturday (deadline) if anyone else wants to persuade me otherwise...
